member.name: T:Tel4Net.TelephoneNormalizer
member.summary: This class provides phone number Normalizations functionality

member.name: M:Tel4Net.TelephoneNormalizer.ToPhoneNumberNormalization(System.String,Tel4Net.TelephoneOptions,System.String)
member.summary: Normalize a phone number, with respect to parts which that phone number provides (e.g. it won't change an international phone number to city phone number).
member.param: while normalizing an international phone number, let you choose that number start with 00 or +.

member.name: T:Tel4Net.TelephoneOptions
member.summary: Provides extra options while validating a telephone number

member.name: P:Tel4Net.TelephoneOptions.ProcessNaturalCharacterOnly
member.summary:
If true: ignores any characters beside formal ascii english numbers.
If false: try to convert undefined characters (number from other languages) to ascii english corresponding characters, and then normalize.

member.name: T:Tel4Net.TelephoneValidator
member.summary: This class provides phone number Validations functionality

member.name: M:Tel4Net.TelephoneValidator.PhoneNumberI10nValidation(System.String,Tel4Net.TelephoneOptions)
member.summary: Validate a phone number in length and signature of against an international phone number rules

member.name: M:Tel4Net.TelephoneValidator.PhoneNumberCityValidation(System.String,Tel4Net.TelephoneOptions)
member.summary: Validate a phone number in length and signature of against an city phone number rules

member.name: M:Tel4Net.TelephoneValidator.PhoneNumberInboundValidation(System.String,Tel4Net.TelephoneOptions)
member.summary: Validate a phone number in length and signature of against an inbound (local) phone number rules

member.name: M:Tel4Net.TelephoneValidator.PhoneNumberValidate(System.String,Tel4Net.TelephoneOptions)
member.summary: Validates phone number in length and signatures regardless that if the phone number is local, city or international number

member.name: M:Tel4Net.TelephoneValidator.PhoneNumberValidateFormat(System.String,Tel4Net.TelephoneOptions)
member.summary: Validations only the signatures of the phone number

member.name: M:Tel4Net.TelephoneValidator.PhoneNumberValidateLength(System.String,Tel4Net.TelephoneOptions)
member.summary: Validates only the total length of the phone number
